meanings.sent1: The movie was dislikable because it was boring.
meanings.sent2: Her dislikable behavior made it hard to be friends with her.
meanings.sent3: The dislikable food made everyone at the party cringe.
meanings.sent4: The dislikable weather cast a gloomy shadow over the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The dislikable smell in the room lingered long after the source was removed.

meanings.sent1: The dislikable comments hurt her feelings.
meanings.sent2: The dislikable smell emanating from the garbage can was unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The dislikable noise from the construction site disrupted the peaceful neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The dislikable taste of the medicine made it hard to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The dislikable appearance of the old building made it stand out among the modern structures.
